index:
Ho Mubarak Apko ye suhani Raat,
Mile khwabo me bhi khud ka saath,
khule jab apki Aankhen to,
Dheron khushiya ho Apke sath. GooD NighT
Dear customer ur sleeping service has been activated now enjoy unlimited sweet dreams browsing in ur bed.Dream dekh ne walo ko hamari nind k nagri se apko hardik suvratry

Apun 1 sher bolega
Chand upr se phek rela hai light
Bole to ho gai hai night, Bnd krne ka light
Aur sone ka 1 dum tight Bole to Good night

Raat Kafi Ho Chuki Hai
Ab Chiragh Bujha Dijiye
Ek Haseen Khwab Rah Dekhta Hai Apki,
Bus Palkon Ke Parde Gira Dijiye
Good Night

Wash ur face and wash ur feet
Now itâ€™s time 2 fall asleep
your eyes are weak & mouth can't Speak
So hope this night shall be nice and sweet.
Good Night

Ho Gai Hai Ab To Black Black Night,
Ab Bnd Bhi Ker Do White White light
Sweet Sweet Sapno Ki Pakad lo flight
Ok My Dear GooD Night

Upr aasman se jo tute vo 1 sitara.
Use dekh Maine Rab ko pukara.
Rakhe wo salamt apko hamesha. 
Kabhi na tute ye Rishta hmara

Nikal aya CHAND aur bikhar gaye SITARE
So gaye panchi aur so gaye nazare
Kho jao aap bhi mithe khawabo me
aur dekho raat me sapne PYARE PYARE
Good Night

Ho chuki hai raat bahut, ab so bhi jaiye
Jo hain dil ke kareeb, unke khyalo mein kho bhi jaiye
Kar raha hoga, koi intazaar aapka
Khwabon mein hi sahi unse mil to aaiye
Good night

Duniya main reh kar sapno mein kho jaoo
Kisi ko apna bana lo
Ya kisi ke ho jao
Agar kuch b nahi hota to
Takiya lo or so jaoo
Good night

Aap Jo So Gaye To Khwab Hamara Aayega
Ek Pyari Si Muskaan Aapke Chehre
Par Layega, Khidki Darwaje Dil
Ke Khol Ker Sona Warna Aap Hi
Batao Hamara Khwab Kaha Se Aayega

Chupke Se Suno, Ek Choti Si
Baat, Ho Gyi Hai Raat. So
Jao Pyar Se, Sapno Ke Saath,
Band Kro Light, Mujhe
Apse Kehna Hai Good Night

Rat Ko Chupke Se Aati Hai
Ek Pari, Kuch Khushiyon K
Sapne Lati Hai Pari, Kehti
Hai Sapno K Aagosh Me Kho
Jao, Bhul K Sare Gum
Chupke Se So Jao

Aaj Raat Apko Machhar
Nhi Katega, Coz My Gud
Night Will Take Care Of U 
But  Cheeti Kaat Sakti
Hai  Coz, I Wish U Vry
Sweet Dreams

So Jaao So Jaao
Mujhe Good Night Kahe Bina
Raat Ki Rani Aayegi, Dhakka De Kar Jayegi, 
Bed Se Tumhe Girayegi
Phir Sari Ninni Udd Jayegi

Hawa Chal Rahi Hai Right,
Taare Chamak Rahe Hain Bright,
Moon Taaro K Beech Me Hai White
Zyada Mat Socho Band Karo Light,
Aur So Jao Good Night

Shut Down Your Eyes,
Log On Some Memories,
Download Some Dreams,
Save Some Joys,
Delete All Your Sorrows
Then, Start Sleeping Good Night

Dil mein halka sa shor ho raha hai,
Bina SMS Dil bore ho raha hai
Kahin aisa to nahin ek pyara sa dost
GOOD NIGHT kia bina so raha hai

Mere hatho mein tera hath ho,
Meri tanhaiyo mein tera sath ho,
Or ho sard raat khamosh
Hum ho teri baahon mein or pyar ki baat ho
 Good Night

Dil ki kitaab mein gulaab uska tha,
Raat ki neendo mein khawaab uska tha,
Jab maine puchha ki kitna pyaar karte ho mujhe,
Mar jaayenge aapke bina jawaab uska tha 
Good Night

Ab to ye hamari aankhe bhi humse sawaal kerti hai
Ab to bus aapke khayalon me hi ye raaten kat ti hain
Jab tak hum aapko goodnight na keh den
Tab tak ye kambakth neend bhi aane se inkaar kerti hain

Tu ye mat samajh ke tujh se juda hoker hum bahut chen se sote hain
Raat ko teri tasveer dekh ker saari raat rote hain

Ab to na din ko karaar hai aur na raaton ko chen hai
Ab to bus unki yaadon me baste meri aankon ke rain hain
